mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail ( mail_id , sender , recipient , cc , title , content , mailbox_id , emp_id ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(mail_id),0)+1 mail_id FROM mail) , #{sender} , #{recipient} , #{cc} , #{title} , #{content} , 'd1' , (SELECT emp_id FROM emp WHERE mail LIKE '%'||#{cc}||'%') )
